Articles.Content:
I miniaturized a vanilla winglet to put it on some missiles.

Here are some in action:

These winglets have zero drag and an extremely strong stabilizing influence, so they're probably unfair to use in normal rockets.

Having 'accidently' modified the command module ejection system (think LES but stumpy) in to a nose mounted missile I see this nifty-ness that far surpases mine

Nicely done missile that person!

I found that I only really needed to modify the wings and add a Yawmaster in order to build a functioning airplane, although attaching missiles unbalances it a bit, and the fact you have to fire their engines before detachment, rather than at the same time, throws off one's aim.
Sorry to double post, but I thought that I would attach some ready-made glider wings (modified Jaanus' wings), for the lazy amongst us. Hopefully it won't clash with any other parts.
oh god why did you necro this....
